word_mean: 池：贮藏体液的封闭空间

sentence.Network_en: The cistern is empty but soon fills again.
sentence.Network_cn: 蓄水池里现在没水,但不久就会储满水的.

sentence.Network_en: In final analysis, I am simply a cistern regularly filled, regularly drained.
sentence.Network_cn: 归根结底, 我不过是一个蓄水池,定时装满, 又定时排空.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French cisterne, from Latin cisterna, from cista 'box' (see cist)

entry.tran: (大楼的)蓄水箱，水塔;(抽水马桶的)水箱
entry.def: A cistern is a container which stores the water supply for a building, or that holds the water for flushing a toilet.
A cistern is a container for storing rain water.

means.word_mean: 1. a sac or cavity containing fluid especially lymph or cerebrospinal fluid
2. a tank that holds the water used to flush a toilet
3. an artificial reservoir for storing liquids; especially an underground tank for storing rainwater

auth_sentence.content: Ponkrum had no well and only a simple cistern.
auth_sentence.res_content: Ponkrum had no well and only a simple cistern.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ponkrum had no well and only a simple cistern.

auth_sentence.content: If you don't have a dual flush toilet put a brick into the cistern to reduce capacity.
auth_sentence.res_content: If you don't have a dual flush toilet put a brick into the cistern to reduce capacity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If you don't have a dual flush toilet put a brick into the cistern to reduce capacity.

auth_sentence.content: It looked to me as if they did a pretty good job, even if I didn't fancy a cup of coffee made on the cistern of the lavatory.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"……方向的"; 2. 表名词,"……场所"

stems_affixes.word_buile: east东+ern……方向的→adj.东方的,东部的
northeast东北+ern……方向的→adj.东北方的,来自东北的
north北+ern……方向的→adj.北方的,北部的
northwest西北+ern……方向的→adj.西北方的,来自西北的
south南+ern……方向的→adj.南方的,南部的
southwest西南+ern……方向的→adj.西南的,来自西南的
west西+ern……方向的→adj.西方的,西部的
cist箱子+ern……场所→n.[抽水马桶的]贮水池
lect讲话+ern……场所→n.[教堂中的]诵经台
